IoT Camp - Minneapolis
June 23rd, 2016 at Euler Training Center
This workshop series is brought to you by our Miracle Labs Team in collaboration with IBM. In this workshop attendees will learn to configure and connect a Raspberry Pi 3 to the IBM Watson IOT Platform , IBM BlueMix and then expose persisted device data from Cloudant as REST APIs using NodeRed and the Loopback Framework.
Join us on June 23rd, 2016 from 9:00 AM onwards as we take you through the live implementation of an IoT Flow from Device to Developers! The workshop is absolutely FREE and will include a wide array of technologies including Node.js, APIs, BlueMix and the Cloud.
 
Register Now and Reserve Your Seat Today
